publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4398 Dr Elaine Murray: Congratulations to Tennent’s Scottish Cup Finalists—That the Parliament congratulates Heart of Midlothian FC on winning the Tennent’s Scottish Cup Final 2006; also congratulates Gretna FC on being magnificent runners-up and believes that the Scottish Second Division Champion’s performance in the cup final will give added credibility to its work in the community, promoting sport and encouraging young people to be physically active and to resist drugs, and further congratulates both teams and their supporters on a marvellous day for Scottish football.

S2M-4398 Congratulations to Tennent’s Scottish Cup Finalists (lodged on 15 May 2006) Scott Barrie*, Mr Charlie Gordon*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Campbell Martin*, Eleanor Scott*, Fiona Hyslop*, Dave Petrie*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr John Swinney*, Christine May*, Murray Tosh*, Nora Radcliffe*, Margaret Smith*, Maureen Macmillan*, Tommy Sheridan*, John Scott*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Fergus Ewing*, Mike Pringle*, Richard Baker*, Cathie Craigie*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Alex Johnstone*, Phil Gallie*

S2M-4398 Congratulations to Tennent’s Scottish Cup Finalists (lodged on 15 May 2006) Jackie Baillie*, Bill Butler*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Helen Eadie*, David McLetchie*, Karen Gillon*, Trish Godman*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Christine Grahame*

S2M-4398 Congratulations to Tennent’s Scottish Cup Finalists (lodged on 15 May 2006) Chris Ballance*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Brian Adam*, Marlyn Glen*

S2M-4398 Dr Elaine Murray: Congratulations to Tennent’s Scottish Cup Finalists—That the Parliament congratulates Heart of Midlothian FC on winning the Tennent’s Scottish Cup Final 2006; also congratulates Gretna FC on being magnificent runners-up and believes that the Scottish Second Division Champion’s performance in the cup final will give added credibility to its work in the community, promoting sport and encouraging young people to be physically active and to resist drugs, and further congratulates both teams and their supporters on a marvellous day for Scottish football. Supported by: Scott Barrie, Mr Charlie Gordon, Mr Jamie Stone, Campbell Martin, Eleanor Scott, Fiona Hyslop, Dave Petrie, Bruce Crawford, Mr John Swinney, Christine May, Murray Tosh, Nora Radcliffe, Margaret Smith, Maureen Macmillan, Tommy Sheridan, John Scott, Mrs Nanette Milne, Fergus Ewing, Mike Pringle, Richard Baker, Cathie Craigie, Mr Frank McAveety, Alex Johnstone, Phil Gallie, Jackie Baillie, Bill Butler, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Helen Eadie, David McLetchie, Karen Gillon, Trish Godman, Mr Jim Wallace, Christine Grahame, Chris Ballance, Marilyn Livingstone, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Brian Monteith, Brian Adam, Marlyn Glen, Dennis Canavan*
S2M-4398 Congratulations to Tennent’s Scottish Cup Finalists (lodged on 15 May 2006) Susan Deacon*
S2M-4398 Congratulations to Tennent’s Scottish Cup Finalists (lodged on 15 May 2006) John Swinburne*
S2M-4398 Congratulations to Tennent’s Scottish Cup Finalists (lodged on 15 May 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
